name: Cannon Duels (Amstrad CPC)
description:
Cannon Duels is a 1 or 2 players game for Amstrad CPC, developed with CPCtelera and other tools for the  #CPCRetroDev 2018.

Two Cannons are located at each side of the screen and can shoot at each other. At the centre of the screen there is a group of bricks. Cannon Balls will destroy the 
first brick they encounter in their path or subtract a live from the opposite player if hitting the Cannon. When hitting a Brick there is chance to get a Power Up.  When a Cannon is hit by a Cannon Ball, it loses a live.  Reaching 0 ends the game. A player gets an Extra Live  every  time a collects 464 points.

Read the GameManual.pdf for more details on which Power Ups are available and what they do.

The Source Code is provided under MIT License.
